name: Margarita
recipe: 1 1/2 oz tequila, 1/2 oz triple sec, 1 oz lime juice, salt

name: Martini
recipe: 2 1/2 oz gin, 1/2 oz dry vermouth, 1 olive

name: Old Fashioned
recipe: 2 oz bourbon, 2 dashes angostura bitters, 1 sugar cube, 1 orange peel

name: Negroni
recipe: 1 oz gin, 1 oz campari, 1 oz sweet vermouth, 1 orange peel
